page.title: 13The Village Hall
page.content: Village Hall was built in 1975. It is used by the Playgroup,Youth Club, Bingo,Bowls,Badminton,and for Jumble Sales.Other social events such as Christmas Parties,Discos and Sales are held here also.The Village Hall is well used. The caretaker is responsible for cleaning the Hall and opening during the day and locking up at night. The Youth Club was formed in 1965.Young people between the ages of 11 to 21 can be members.Meetings are held each Monday evening in Winter from 7.00pm until 10.00pm.Members play pool,darts,table tennis,connect four and snakes and ladders.Sweets and soft drinks are sold. The Women's Institute,a national organisation was formed in 1915.It started in Tollerton in 1924.The W.I.is a social,
